mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REACH_MEDIATE( reach_mediate_id, complaint_main_id, rea_mediate_result, rea_summary, rea_user_id, rea_patient, rea_doctor, rea_case_info, rea_address, rea_meeting_time, handle_people, handle_time, next_link, next_link_man, create_by, create_date, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{reachMediateId}, #{complaintMainId}, #{reaMediateResult}, #{reaSummary}, #{reaUserId}, #{reaPatient}, #{reaDoctor}, #{reaCaseInfo}, #{reaAddress}, #{reaMeetingTime}, #{handlePeople}, #{handleTime}, #{nextLink}, #{nextLinkMan}, #{createUser}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, 0 )
